messages.content: It's an honour to be the MP for a constituency as varied, mixed, and exciting as Islington South & Finsbury.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stayed in touch with constituents and helped over 20,000 people.
Worked with the council, representing views to the Government, highlighting problems with a few of the issues and supporting what matters to you.

mentions.tacticalSituation: This year, the country faces a choice.

issues.economy: Tories' wrong priorities: cut tax for the 3,000 wealthiest in the country, whilst cutting 1 in 5 Sure Start centres.

leaflet.personalStatement: It's an honour to be the MP for a constituency as varied, mixed, and exciting as Islington South & Finsbury.

politicalExperience.achievements: Helped over 20,000 people, engaged with local government on issues, supported what matters to constituents.

images.caption: Emily Thornberry MP, Islington South & Finsbury

leaflet.additionalNotes: P.S. If you'd like to learn more about my work, you can read an article by a Guardian journalist who followed me for a week.
